title: Hour 2: Keeping Score
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. and Brian Windhorst react to Lebron's comments on his relationship-or lack of-with Kareem Abdul-Jabbar as he closes in on Kareem's all-time scoring record. Plus, Damien Woody is here to help us preview the upcoming defensive matchup between Micah Parsons and Aaron Donald as the Cowboys and Rams face off this weekend. You bet we got Joe Fortenbaugh back with us to take us through his favorite bets for the week. Dan Orlovsky is here to argue with Stephen A. about which team will win the NFC West.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: What is Lebron saying about his relationship with Kareem Abdul-Jabbar?
